meta.title: Dayton Public Schools | Serving the Greater Dayton Area in Ohio

meta.content: Dayton Public Schools (DPS) is an urban district of 14,000 students in preschool through high school. Take a deeper look at DPS and contact us today!
meta.name: description

li.a: Anonymous Safer Ohio School Tip Line

div.p: DPS school buildings remain closed for the remainder of the academic year. Students continue remote learning through May 21.

article.p: Dayton Public Schools serves more than 12,000 students in preschool through high school. Our decisions, academic and operational, continue to rest on our four academic non-negotiables: (1) kindergarten readiness, (2) third-graders reading on grade level, (3) closing the achievement gap, and (4) high school graduates ready for college and careers. Our success is possible with the support and involvement of our families and community partners.

div.p: "It is not a Job, it is a Mission" - Dr. Elizabeth J. Lolli. more
The Dayton BOE is run by Board President Mohamed Al-Hamdani and Vice President Jocelyn Spencer-Rhynard. more

select.name: ds
select.option: Charity Adams Earley Girls Academy Elementary School
